name: Raid Bezos
description:
THE GAME

The day before Christmas is always a stressful moment for everyone in the North Pole… yet today is even worse than usual : Big Corporations have come to enslave Santa’s elves ! You got to protect Christmas magic at all cost.

You are the Security General of the North Pole (an elve) and must stop the Big Corpo goons from enslaving every worker in the North Pole ! Santa is out of town preparing for Christmas and you are the only one who can protect the workforce, the gifts and save the day.
Fortunately for you, Santa always leaves some “special gifts” in case of emergency, but their content is hidden until you unpack them.
Christmas magic !

FEATURES

- Defend Santa's gifts and home
- Big Corporations want to take over his operation!
- Shoot high-speed and explosive snowballs
- Survive all the enemy waves who are ready to attack!

TEAM

Game Design:
Timothé COURTIER
Antoine PERSON
Nathan RENAUD

Game Programming:
Nam MIRBEAU-BAUDIN
Nicolas VALADOU
Vincent BOUTIN
Jules FRITZ

Game Art:
Etienne NEMIEC
Tamara DIMOVSKI

Sound Design:
Antoine PERSON
Timothé COURTIER

Producing: 
Tristan SOLARO

This game was developped in 72 hours for the CHRISTMAS UNREAL JAM 2020

Right click to put a trap on the ground

Scroll for an explosive surprise !

To reload your weapon go behind the house and PRESS E
